name: swoole/swoole
description: Swoole is an event-driven, asynchronous, coroutine-based concurrency library with high performance for PHP.

suggest.ext-pdo_mysql: PDO_MYSQL is required for Swoole to work with MySQL
suggest.ext-pdo_pgsql: PDO_PGSQL is required for Swoole to work with PostgreSQL
suggest.ext-curl: CURL is required for Swoole to work with HTTP
suggest.ext-sockets: Sockets is required for Swoole to work with Socket
suggest.ext-openssl: OpenSSL is required for Swoole to work with HTTPS

configure-options.name: with-openssl-dir
configure-options.description: Specify openssl installation directory (requires OpenSSL 1.1.0 or later)?

configure-options.name: enable-swoole-thread
configure-options.description: Enable swoole thread support (need php zts support)

configure-options.name: enable-iouring
configure-options.description: Enable iouring for file async support

configure-options.name: with-liburing-dir
configure-options.description: Specify liburing installation directory (requires liburing 2.8 or later)

configure-options.name: enable-uring-socket
configure-options.description: Enable iouring for http coroutine server support

configure-options.name: enable-zstd
configure-options.description: Enable zstd support (requires zstd 1.4.0 or later)
